about_the_game:
If... everything could be chosen again.

Will our final outcome be... different?

In 2041, as a detective, you receive an invitation from a renowned scientist named "Jody". When you arrive at Jody's residence according to the contents of the letter, you only have time to attend the doctor's funeral. As a result, you are caught up in a series of unsettling mysteries.

An unknown invitation from the deceased?

The mysterious girl who suddenly appeared?

A strange machine buzzing?

The terrifying truth intertwined in a spiral?

Worry, suffer, struggle.

Give everything for the so-called 'perfect ending' that you don't even know if exists.

Only in this way can we end this tragic 'fate'.

Only in this way can we welcome the 'future' that you have hoped for.

The game is expected to last 5-7 hours and contains a large number of reasoning elements. The names of people, places, and organizations that appear in the game are all fictional settings and should not be elevated to reality.

Hope you have fun.

Official group: 1014831887

short_description: This is a science fiction detective themed visual novel game, where players need to play the role of a "detective", connecting seemingly unrelated events and discovering mysterious truths hidden behind them, Please survive, and walk with your head held high towards the 'perfect ending' you expect.
